import React, { Component } from "react"; var https = require("https"); class Calculator extends React.Component { state = { apiKey: "4b2ea96ceadc94e3995c", currency: "cad", currencies: { CAD: "CAD", USD: "USD", NGN: "NGN", EUR: "EUR", INR: "INR", GBP: "GBP", AUD: "AUD", ZAR: "ZAR", AED: "AED", CNY: "CNY" }, values: { chequing: 2000.0, savings_for_taxes: 4000.0, rainy_day_fund: 506.0, savings_for_fun: 5000.0, savings_for_travel: 400.0, savings_for_personal_development: 200.0, investment_1: 5000.0, investment_2: 60000.0, investment_3: 24000.0, primary_home: 455000.0, second_home: 1564321.0, credit_card_1: 4342.0, credit_card_2: 322.0, mortgage_1: 250999.0, mortgage_2: 632634.0, line_of_credit: 10000.0, investment_loan: 10000.0 }, vall: 0 }; convertCurrency = (fromCurrency, toCurrency) => { fromCurrency = encodeURIComponent(fromCurrency); toCurrency = encodeURIComponent(toCurrency); var query = fromCurrency + "_" + toCurrency; var val = 0; var url = "https://free.currconv.com/api/v7/convert?q=" + query + "&compact=ultra&apiKey=" + this.state.apiKey; fetch(url) .then(res => res.json()) .then(result => { result = result[query]; val = result; console.log(val); let updated_values = { chequing: 80 }; for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(this.state.values)) { console.log(`${key}: ${value}`); } this.setState({ values: updated_values }); console.log(this.state); }); }; getCurrency = e => { var rate = 0; // this.setState({ currency: e.target.value }); console.log(this.convertCurrency("USD", "CAD")); console.log(rate); }; numberWithCommas(x) { return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ","); } render() { return (
